properties.name: homelab.chat.bot-token
properties.description: Token for the telegram bot to access its api.

properties.name: homelab.openapi.key
properties.description: Key for the OpenAPI ap. Can be found here https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys.

properties.name: homelab.chat.allowed-chat-ids
properties.description: Telegram chat ids that are allowed to use the bot.
